title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Project-Based Learning for Optical Planar Waveguide Characterization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic optical theory and hands-on experience with experimental equipment
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can assemble waveguide-specific experimental systems and explain optical coupling principles
Students can measure planar waveguide refractive index and mode characteristics with 95% accuracy using an automatic prism coupler system
Students can document optical system design processes and create presentation materials by analyzing experimental data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
